channel.title: Item on Item error
channel.description:
For whatever the reason, using two items disconnects with this error: [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 136 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17336) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15497) at client.packetSending(client.java:15466) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:149) at server.main(server.java:54)[/code]
Those lines are just packets and a globalMessage = ""; I want item on item fixed =[ I'll tell you whatever you need to know.
Thanks.

Any. I was trying to get fletching going, from scratch. 946 and 1511, knife and logs.

For whatever the reason, using two items disconnects with this error:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 136 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17336) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15497) at client.packetSending(client.java:15466) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:149) at server.main(server.java:54)
